data.title: Murata Manufacturing Net Income 2013-2023 | MRAAY
data.meta_description:
Murata Manufacturing annual/quarterly net income history and growth rate from 2013 to 2023. Net income can be defined as company's net profit or loss after all revenues, income items, and expenses have been accounted for.
  • Murata Manufacturing net income for the quarter ending December 31, 2023 was $0.336B, a 8.15% decline year-over-year.
  • Murata Manufacturing net income for the twelve months ending December 31, 2023 was $1.539B, a 18.06% decline year-over-year.
  • Murata Manufacturing annual net income for 2024 was $1.248B, a 33.53% decline from 2023.
  • Murata Manufacturing annual net income for 2023 was $1.877B, a 27.09% decline from 2022.
  • Murata Manufacturing annual net income for 2022 was $2.575B, a 20.56% increase from 2021.
